SPECIMEN DATA: specimens uncommon in gently sloping, central areas with dolerite stones (where O. karrooensis collected) but not on dolerite koppies (where O. austerus collected), sitting in open on rocky ground or doorkeeping at burrow entrances, one excavated from burrow 20 cm deep in coarse sandy-loam soil, another found dead in grass tuft
